Description: PLEASE CLICK HERE TO SEE FULL ITEM DESCRIPTION DescriptionALL TIMEPIECES ARE GUARANTEED AUTHENTIC   Series: Speedmaster Day/Date Automatic Chronograph Model #: 3523.30 Version: Men's / Gents Case: Stainless steel Band: Stainless steel Dial: Silver Crystal: Sapphire Movement: Automatic.  Self-winding movement never requires a battery. Case size: 39MM (diagonally) or 41MM (horizontally, including crown) Total circumference: 7.5" Condition: Could almost pass for a brand new watch. Sapphire crystal is flawless. Dial/hands are perfect. Bezel shines like new. Bracelet shows no wear and retains original brushed/polished finishes. You would have to look to obscure parts of the watch like the inner bracelet clasp and the caseback to find any evidence of wear at all. All functions have been tested and work perfectly. This is the significantly nicer day/date model, with perimeter date, day and month as well as 24 hour feature. This is also the newer model, with more robust bracelet design, along with a few other minor updates (modern crown design, etc.).    Click here to view the WRISTWATCHTRADER EBAY STORE   Sizing: Occasionally good fortune will shine upon us and the timepiece will fit perfectly upon arrival.  However, for the majority of cases we will need to add/remove links for desired fit.  For more info about how to obtain expansion links, please do not hesitate to contact me and I'll be happy to help. Return Policy: I bend over backwards to ship only the highest quality items (please see my buyer reviews below).  In the rare case of a bonafide defect please contact me immediately so that we can work towards a solution.     In order to provide you with the widest possible selection of timepieces, I do not ship items on a "try on" basis.  I appreciate your cooperation.   If you haven't already, please take the time to read my buyer reviews (9000+ over 15 years), which can be found here:   WRISTWATCHTRADER BUYER REVIEWS Pictures sell! ConditionDescription:
Could almost pass for a brand new watch. Sapphire crystal is flawless. Dial/hands are perfect. Bezel shines like new. Bracelet shows no wear and retains original brushed/polished finishes. You would have to look to obscure parts of the watch like the inner bracelet clasp and the caseback to find any evidence of wear at all. All functions have been tested and work perfectly.

This is the significantly nicer day/date model, with perimeter date, day and month as well as 24 hour feature.

This is also the newer model, with more robust bracelet design, along with a few other minor updates (modern crown design, etc.).
Title: Mens Omega Speedmaster Automatic Chronograph Watch Silver Dial Day Date 3523.30

ReturnPolicy.Description: If the item received is not as described, please contact us ASAP so that we can make return arrangements. Items returned must arrive within 14 days of receipt in the exact condition they were shipped.
